title: Downloaded videos don't play

Since I can't view the videos offline, I have no use for this app. Otherwise nicely designed interface. Overall, I prefer the actual site.

title: Good, but achievements don't work

title: Great!
comment: Very nice app.  Further improvements, it would be great if: - We could properly visually navigate the tree of topics and videos. I tend to get lost. - We could keep track of what we watched in-app - The app kept its position accross starts, also within videos. - When navigating up through topics, the app would go back to the same position in a screen. - We can properly navigate (tree style) the downloaded videos. Hard to determine what to delete now.
Love this app helps me I when I don't understand something.

title: Phone version
comment: Could you please make a phone version as well? I love this app on my tablet but I can't use this app on my phone.the other new Khan academy app requires you to pay to use view the videos more easily, which I think is very cheap. The Khan academy themselves offer service for free but why do the third party developer request money? That's why I love this app. Please please make a phone version. Thank you!!

title: Very very nice in micromax funbook pro
comment: Supurb very great

title: The best viewer
comment: There is one issue in the app, when i returnt to the previos page, the app shows me the top side  not the point where i stoped before,  so i have to go down!  Please solve this issue and the app will be great

title: Beautiful
comment: This app has a really nice interface -- easy and quick to navigate, clean font, thumbnails for every topic and video.  The Khan site was sluggish on the Nexus 7, so this app is much better way to access the content.  The only issue I can find so far is that brand new content is not available.  Since Concentric Sky doesn't have a support forum, it might be good for them to create a FAQ that answers questions like "how often is content updated?"

title: Love this app.
comment: Works perfectly.

title: Amazing, far better then anything else
comment: I tried every khan app, and this is by far the best. I really do appreciate all the hard work that was put into making this app. It really does show. It runs fluidly.

title: Very good
comment: This is the best unofficial KA app for android
Thank you for creating this app, it is the best one I've used for khan academy.

title: Excellent viewer
comment: Looks fantastic on my Nook hd.   Sleek interface.   Captions work.

title: Best Khan Academy app
comment: But it doesn't seem to update the energy points correctly when watching a video.

title: Huge Improvement Over Older Apps
comment: Highly functional app and supports offline downloading that works with the actual Khan Academy layouts, descriptions, and categories so you don't have to learn a new user interface to navigate to the videos. Would be nice to have support for subtitles offline or on the video when in landscape though but I'm not sure if the API or lack of flash on Android would even make that possible.

title: Extremely well designed but some lacking features
comment: I have tried ALL Khan Academy apps and this one is among the best. Clean interface and quick to launch, with the ability to save one or several videos for offline view.  Proposed enhancements to make it great: - Include a "Search" function - More flexibility to install on Android devices. I installed it on my tablet, but I was unable to install it on my Galaxy S3 or my wife HTC Sensation. Bummer.
Works good for me, very nice design and layout

title: No real progress save
comment: If you change task or go to home screen it forgets your video position and your progress even with 2 GB RAM (Nexus 10) The best khan viewer anyway, but this bug is bugging....

title: A beast
comment: Easily the best Khan viewer on Android. Effective and well-designed.
